data.value: This is a generalization of a histogram function.  A histogram divides the space into bins, and returns the count of the number of points in each bin.  This function allows the computation of the sum, mean, median, or other statistic of the values (or set of values) within each bin.
All but the last (righthand-most) bin is half-open.  In other words, if

is a set of sequences, the statistic will be computed on each independently.
